scripts.test-firefox-laptop: env DEVICE=Laptop WIDTH='1200' HEIGHT='700' SERVICE='geckodriver' npm run test
scripts.test-chrome-laptop: env DEVICE=Laptop WIDTH='1200' HEIGHT='700' SERVICE='chromedriver' npm run test
scripts.test-firefox-tablet: env DEVICE=Tablet WIDTH='788' HEIGHT='700' SERVICE='geckodriver' npm run test
scripts.test-chrome-tablet: env DEVICE=Tablet WIDTH='788' HEIGHT='700' SERVICE='chromedriver' npm run test
scripts.test-chrome-mobile: env DEVICE=Mobile WIDTH='500' HEIGHT='700' SERVICE='chromedriver' npm run test
scripts.test-traditional: npm run test-firefox-laptop && npm run test-chrome-laptop && npm run test-firefox-tablet && npm run test-chrome-tablet && npm run test-chrome-mobile
